/hirest/v1/particularexamdetails/:exam_i: get exam details from exam id
/hirest/v1/getExamListData/:user_id: get exam list for perticuler candidate user
/hirest/v1/updateInstituteDetails/:insti: update institute details from institute id
/hirest/v1/updateCampusDriveListStatus/:: update campus drive status from campis id
/hirest/v1/getCampusCandidateDetails/:ca: get candidate details from campus drive id
/hirest/v1/add/exam/report/details: insert data of exam in exam score details
/hirest/v1/updateSignupCandidateUrl: sign up url generate for candidate registration
/hirest/v1/exam/status: update exam status and enddate and startdate
/hirest/v1/campus/exam/details: get candidate exam detail from exam id and usercode
/hirest/v1/campus/exam/status: update candidate exam status from exam id and usercode
/hirest/v1/updateCandidateExamStatus/:ca: update exam status in candidate exam details
/hirest/v1/getTPODetails/:user_code: get tpo details on basis of user_code while tpo-login
/hirest/v1/getCampusCandidateDetailsSend: send mail with campus candidate details
/hirest/v1/gd/institute/list: get institute list whose gd process is left
/hirest/v1/getCandidateListForGdPI: update candidate list for gd pi
/hirest/v1/shortlistedCampusDriveList/:s: get shortlisted campus drive details for particular stage
/hirest/v1/getAssessmentDetails/:assessm: get assessment details for particular category
/hirest/v1/getLocationList/:stage: get location list for GD or PI
/hirest/v1/university/detail: get all university details based on location
/hirest/v1/getScoreDetailsForGroupIds: get gd or pi score details list
/hirest/v1/getCampusDriveDetailsForGdDat: get campus drive details for gd dates
/hirest/v1/getCandidateListForAssessor: get candidate list for assessor user
/hirest/v1/getFinalCandidateList: get candidate list for particular location
/hirest/v1/sendGdReportMail: send mail to selected assessor from GD
/hirest/v1/assessor/profile/detail/:user: get assessor detail from user code
/hirest/v1/getSelectedGdDateforPI: get selected gd dates for pi assessment
/hirest/v1/getDefaultCampusYears: get default campus drive year list
/hirest/v1/getGroupDate: get group name based on campus year
/hirest/v1/findGroupName: find group name exists or not
/hirest/v1/getGroupNameFromDateAndDesign: get group name from date and designation
/hirest/v1/switchCandidate: switch candidate from gd to pi or pi to gd
/hirest/v1/getFinalizeCandidate: get final candidate details selected by admin on-site
/hirest/v1/sendJoiningInstructionMail: admin will send list of selected candidate to TPO
/hirest/v1/sendEmailtoAdminForHireCandid: tpo will send accept and reject offer candidate list to admin
/hirest/v1/bioDataforCandidate: register bio data for hired candidates
